instance.context:
I feel kind_of bad about it '' . He gave Abel a quick glance and moved closer to the wheel , hugging it to him , and Abel caught this briefest of allusions to guilt . `` I imagine the old girl has n't missed us much '' , Mark added , his eyes on the road . Abel ignored the half expressed
bid for confirmation . He smiled . It was barely possible that his brother was right . He could tell they were approaching the sea .
